snippet: At least three people were killed in two explosions in Kenya’s port city of Mombasa on Saturday, witnesses and the local news media said.
abstract: At least three people are killed in two explosions in Mombasa, Kenya; there is no immediate claim of responsibility.
lead_paragraph: At least three people were killed in two explosions in Kenya’s port city of Mombasa on Saturday, witnesses and the local news media said.

headline.main: Deadly Blasts Rock Port City in Kenya
headline.print_headline: Deadly Blasts Rock Port City in Kenya
